item.title: CVE-2024-33943|2024-05-03T06:58:57.632Z -- HappyKite -- Ultimate Under Construction
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HappyKite Ultimate Under Construction allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Under Construction: from n/a through 1.9.3.
